mapper.insert: INSERT INTO 給与.就業時間履歴 (就業時間ID, 従業員ID, 就業日, 開始時刻, 終了時刻, 休憩時間, 深夜休憩時間) VALUES (#{id}, #{workerNumber.value}, #{work.workDay.value.value}, #{work.workTimeRecord.workTimeRange.startTime.value.value}, #{work.workTimeRecord.workTimeRange.endTime.value.value}, #{work.workTimeRecord.normalBreakTime.value.value}, #{work.workTimeRecord.midnightBreakTime.value.value});

INSERT INTO 給与.就業時間 (従業員ID, 就業時間ID, 就業日, 開始時刻, 終了時刻, 休憩時間, 深夜休憩時間) VALUES (#{workerNumber.value}, #{workTimeId}, #{work.workDay.value.value}, #{work.workTimeRecord.workTimeRange.startTime.value.value}, #{work.workTimeRecord.workTimeRange.endTime.value.value}, #{work.workTimeRecord.normalBreakTime.value.value}, #{work.workTimeRecord.midnightBreakTime.value.value});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM 給与.就業時間 WHERE 従業員ID = #{workerNumber.value} and 就業日 = #{workDay.value.value}
mapper.select: SELECT 就業時間.就業日, 就業時間.開始時刻, 就業時間.終了時刻, 就業時間.休憩時間, 就業時間.深夜休憩時間 FROM 給与.就業時間 as 就業時間 WHERE 就業時間.従業員ID = #{workerNumber.value} AND to_char(就業時間.就業日,'yyyymm') LIKE #{workMonth.endingWithCondition}
